abstract: Macy's is recalling two Martha Stewart frying pans after customers said metal discs popped off pans and caused burns, bruises and welts.
lead_paragraph: Macy’s is recalling two Martha Stewart frying pans after customers said metal discs popped off the pans and caused bruises, burns and welts.

headline.main: Martha Stewart Skillets Are Recalled by Macy’s
headline.print_headline: Martha Stewart Skillets Are Recalled by Macy’s

snippet: Macy’s is recalling two Martha Stewart frying pans after customers said metal discs popped off the pans and caused bruises, burns and welts.
